name: Edge Lock
description:
A melee combat platforming game made during my University years. 

In a grey goo world, search for the entity that stole your heart. Defeat hordes of biomachines and claim what was originally yours.

Controls: 

Arrow Keys - Move

Z - Dash (Works mid air too)

X - Melee Attack

C - Special Grab Attack (Triggerable only when you are fully charged from hitting enough melee attacks)

Programmer: 

Isaac Soong Bo Jun

Artists : 

Thao Thu Thi Tran

Michael Lim
